Instruction: Melt the butter in a 9x13-inch baking dish in the preheated oven, about 5 minutes.

Stir the eggs, milk, flour, salt, and sugar in a bowl until the mixture is smooth. Pour the melted butter from the baking dish into the batter and mix until smooth. Pour the batter into the baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven until cooked thoroughly, for about 20 to 25 minutes.
